name: Siti Arifah
greetingText: I really like your name btw!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy Wishing the happiest of birthdays to the most amazing person in my life. You fill my days with laughter, my heart with love, and my world with endless happiness. Here's to your special day and all the wonderful moments yet to come.
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: I'm sorry if I couldn't give you something memorable. But
